remarks: The kernel of a scalar product of a functional includes the kernel of the functional.  (Contributed by NM, 27-Jan-2015.)
statement:
lkrss.r $e |- R = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
lkrss.k $e |- K = ( Base ` R ) $.
lkrss.f $e |- F = ( LFnl ` W ) $.
lkrss.l $e |- L = ( LKer ` W ) $.
lkrss.d $e |- D = ( LDual ` W ) $.
lkrss.s $e |- .x. = ( .s ` D ) $.
lkrss.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. LVec ) $.
lkrss.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. F ) $.
lkrss.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. K ) $.
lkrss $p |- ( ph -> ( L ` G ) C_ ( L ` ( X .x. G ) ) ) $.
